2C1.1.title: Offering, Giving, Soliciting, or Receiving a Bribe; Extortion Under Color of

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Was the defendant a public official?

noResult.description: Defendant was not a public official

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Did the offense involve more than one bribe or extortion?

yesEffect.description: Offense involved more than one bribe or extortion

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: What is the greatest value among: the payment, the benefit received or to be received in return for the payment, the value of anything obtained or to be obtained by a public official or others acting with a public official, or the loss to the government from the offense?

options.label: More than $6,500
options.description: Use the table in §2B1.1 corresponding to the applicable amount

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Did the offense involve an elected public official or any public official in a high-level decision-making or sensitive position?

yesEffect.description: Offense involved elected public official or high-level decision-making/sensitive position official

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Was the defendant a public official who facilitated entry into the US, obtaining immigration documents, or obtaining government identification documents?

yesEffect.description: Public official facilitated entry into US, immigration documents, or government ID documents

2C1.2.title: Offering, Giving, Soliciting, or Receiving a Gratuity

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Was the defendant a public official?

noResult.description: Defendant was not a public official

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Did the offense involve more than one gratuity?

yesEffect.description: Offense involved more than one gratuity

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: What was the value of the gratuity?

options.label: More than $6,500
options.description: Increase by levels corresponding to the amount from the table in §2B1.1

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Did the offense involve an elected public official or any public official in a high-level decision-making or sensitive position?

yesEffect.description: Offense involved elected official or high-level/sensitive position official

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Was the defendant a public official who facilitated entry into the US, obtaining immigration documents, or obtaining government ID documents?

yesEffect.description: Public official facilitated entry, immigration documents, or government ID documents

2C1.3.title: Conflict of Interest; Payment or Receipt of Unauthorized Compensation

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Did the offense involve actual or planned harm to the government?

yesEffect.description: Offense involved actual or planned harm to the government

2C1.8.title: Making, Receiving, or Failing to Report a Contribution, Donation, or

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Did the value of the illegal transactions exceed $6,500?

yesEffect.description: Increase by the number of levels from the table in §2B1.1 corresponding to that amount

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Did the offense involve, directly or indirectly, an illegal transaction made by or received from?

options.label: A government of a foreign country

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Did the offense involve governmental funds or was it committed to obtain a specific federal benefit?

yesEffect.description: Offense involved contribution, donation, solicitation, expenditure, disbursement, or receipt of governmental funds; or defendant committed offense for purpose of obtaining specific, identifiable non-monetary federal benefit

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Did the defendant engage in 30 or more illegal transactions?

yesEffect.description: Defendant engaged in 30 or more illegal transactions

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Did the offense involve contribution, donation, solicitation, or expenditure made or obtained through intimidation, threat, or coercion?

yesEffect.description: Offense involved contribution, donation, solicitation, or expenditure made or obtained through intimidation, threat of pecuniary or other harm, or coercion
